languages.text: "Да что тут подтверждать!" {n}— взрывается криком мужчина.{/n} "Кьява Гамма была процветающим миром, моя семья возила оттуда товары поколениями! А потом пришли они. Резали, пытали, в жертву тьме приносили целые кварталы! Мы на орбите на корабле только и успевали ловить сообщения... Половина стражи тотчас перешла на их сторону! И даже на корабле нас достало какой-то заразой, из-за которой пол-команды на себя руки наложило! Мы еле успели сбежать, еле долетели сюда... За что нам это?!"

traits.locale_text: "Да что тут подтверждать!" {n}— взрывается криком мужчина.{/n} "Кьява Гамма была процветающим миром, моя семья возила оттуда товары поколениями! А потом пришли они. Резали, пытали, в жертву тьме приносили целые кварталы! Мы на орбите на корабле только и успевали ловить сообщения... Половина охраны тотчас перешла на их сторону! И даже на корабле нас достало какой-то заразой, из-за которой пол-команды на себя руки наложило! Мы еле успели сбежать, еле долетели сюда... За что нам это?!"
traits.speaker: Footfall_Refugee

languages.text: "What more proof do I need?" {n}the man shouts.{/n} "Kiava Gamma used to be a prosperous world, my family transported goods from there for generations! And then they came. They butchered, tortured, sacrificed entire blocks to the darkness! We were on our ship, up in orbit, and all those messages started coming in... Half the wardens down there joined them right away! And they even reached us in our ship with some blight that made half our crew take their own lives! We barely escaped, we barely made it here... Why? Why did this happen to us?"
languages.original_text: "Да что тут подтверждать!" {n}— взрывается криком мужчина.{/n} "Кьява Гамма была процветающим миром, моя семья возила оттуда товары поколениями! А потом пришли они. Резали, пытали, в жертву тьме приносили целые кварталы! Мы на орбите на корабле только и успевали ловить сообщения... Половина стражи тотчас перешла на их сторону! И даже на корабле нас достало какой-то заразой, из-за которой пол-команды на себя руки наложило! Мы еле успели сбежать, еле долетели сюда... За что нам это?!"

traits.locale_text: "There's nothing to support!" {n}the man shouts.{/n} "Kiava Gamma used to be a prosperous world, my family transported goods from there for generations! And then they came. They butchered, tortured, sacrificed entire blocks to the darkness! We were on our ship, up in the orbit, and all those messages started coming in... Half of the guards down there joined them right away! And they even reached us in our ship with some blight that made half of our crew take their own lives! We barely escaped, barely made it here... Why? Why did this happen to us?"
traits.speaker: Footfall_Refugee

They butchered, tortured, sacrificed entire blocks to the darkness! We were on our ship, up in the orbit, and all those messages started coming in... Half of the guards down there joined them right away! And they even reached us in our ship with some blight that made half of our crew take their own lives! We barely escaped, barely made it here... Why? Why did this happen to us?"

And they even reached us in our ship with some blight that made half our crew take their own lives! We barely escaped, we barely made it here... Why? Why did this happen to us?"

They butchered, tortured, sacrificed entire blocks to the darkness! We were on our ship, up in orbit, and all those messages started coming in... Half the wardens down there joined them right away! And they even reached us in our ship with some blight that made half our crew take their own lives! We barely escaped, we barely made it here... Why? Why did this happen to us?"
traits.speaker: Footfall_Refugee

languages.text: 「これ以上、どう証明しろと？」{n}と、男は叫んだ。{/n}「キアヴァ・ガンマはかつて栄えていました。私の家族は代々、あの惑星から物資を輸送していたんです！そこに奴らがやってきた。街全体を虐殺し、拷問にかけ、犠牲にしました！我々が軌道上に乗船していた時に、次々とあのメッセージが流れて…半数の監視兵がすぐに彼らに寝返りました！そして、奴らは我々の船にも疫病なようなものをまき散らし、クルーの半数が自ら命を絶ったんです！首の皮一枚で逃げてきて、ここにたどり着いたというのに…なぜだ？なぜ、我々の身にこんなことが？」
languages.original_text: "What more proof do I need?" {n}the man shouts.{/n} "Kiava Gamma used to be a prosperous world, my family transported goods from there for generations! And then they came. They butchered, tortured, sacrificed entire blocks to the darkness! We were on our ship, up in orbit, and all those messages started coming in... Half the wardens down there joined them right away! And they even reached us in our ship with some blight that made half our crew take their own lives! We barely escaped, we barely made it here... Why? Why did this happen to us?"

traits.locale_text: 「これ以上、どう証明しろと？」{n}と、男は叫んだ。{/n}「キアヴァ・ガンマはかつて栄えていました。私の家族は代々、あの惑星から物資を輸送していたんです！そこに奴らがやってきた。街全体を虐殺し、拷問にかけ、犠牲にしました！我々が軌道上に乗船していた時に、次々とあのメッセージが流れて…半数の監視兵がすぐに彼らに寝返りました！そして、奴らは我々の船にも疫病なようなものをまき散らし、クルーの半数が自ら命を絶ったんです！首の皮一枚で逃げてきて、ここにたどり着いたというのに…なぜだ？なぜ、我々の身にこんなことが？」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Refugee

languages.text: “我还需要什么证据？”{n}那个男人喊了起来。{/n}“基亚瓦伽马星曾经是个繁荣的世界，我家世世代代都从那里运输货物！然后那些人来了，他们大肆屠杀，折磨人们，把整个街区献祭给黑暗！我们当时正呆在飞船上，停泊在行星轨道上，随后一堆信息就涌了进来……一半的守卫立刻倒戈，投靠了他们。他们甚至还把疫病带到了我们的船上，一半的船员都自杀了！我们好不容易逃了出来，逃到这里……为什么？为什么我们会碰上这种事情？”
languages.original_text: "What more proof do I need?" {n}the man shouts.{/n} "Kiava Gamma used to be a prosperous world, my family transported goods from there for generations! And then they came. They butchered, tortured, sacrificed entire blocks to the darkness! We were on our ship, up in orbit, and all those messages started coming in... Half the wardens down there joined them right away! And they even reached us in our ship with some blight that made half our crew take their own lives! We barely escaped, we barely made it here... Why? Why did this happen to us?"

traits.locale_text: “我还需要什么证据？”{n}那个男人喊了起来。{/n}“基亚瓦伽马星曾经是个繁荣的世界，我家世世代代都从那里运输货物！然后那些人来了，他们大肆屠杀，折磨人们，把整个街区献祭给黑暗！我们当时正呆在飞船上，停泊在行星轨道上，随后一堆信息就涌了进来……一半的守卫立刻倒戈，投靠了他们。他们甚至还把疫病带到了我们的船上，一半的船员都自杀了！我们好不容易逃了出来，逃到这里……为什么？为什么我们会碰上这种事情？”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Refugee

languages.text: «¿Qué más pruebas puedo tener?»{n}, grita el hombre.{/n} «Kiava Gamma era un mundo próspero; ¡mi familia llevaba generaciones dedicándose al transporte de mercancías! Hasta que vinieron. ¡Mutilaron, torturaron y sacrificaron comunidades enteras a la oscuridad! Nosotros estábamos en órbita con nuestra nave y, de repente, empezaron a venir mensajes... ¡La mitad de los guardias se unieron a la masacre sin pensárselo! E incluso afectaron nuestra nave de alguna forma; ¡la mitad de nuestra tripulación se quitó la vida! Por poco no escapamos ni llegamos hasta aquí... ¿Por qué? ¿Por qué nos tuvo que pasar esto?».
languages.original_text: "What more proof do I need?" {n}the man shouts.{/n} "Kiava Gamma used to be a prosperous world, my family transported goods from there for generations! And then they came. They butchered, tortured, sacrificed entire blocks to the darkness! We were on our ship, up in orbit, and all those messages started coming in... Half the wardens down there joined them right away! And they even reached us in our ship with some blight that made half our crew take their own lives! We barely escaped, we barely made it here... Why? Why did this happen to us?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Qué más pruebas puedo tener?»{n}, grita el hombre.{/n} «Kiava Gamma era un mundo próspero; ¡mi familia llevaba generaciones dedicándose al transporte de mercancías! Hasta que vinieron. ¡Mutilaron, torturaron y sacrificaron comunidades enteras a la oscuridad! Nosotros estábamos en órbita con nuestra nave y, de repente, empezaron a venir mensajes... ¡La mitad de los guardias se unieron a la masacre sin pensárselo! E incluso afectaron nuestra nave de alguna forma; ¡la mitad de nuestra tripulación se quitó la vida! Por poco no escapamos ni llegamos hasta aquí... ¿Por qué? ¿Por qué nos tuvo que pasar esto?».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Refugee

languages.text: « Vous voulez des preuves ? {n}tonne l'homme.{/n} Kiava Gamma était un monde prospère, ma famille a travaillé dans l'exportation de marchandises pendant des générations ! Puis ils sont arrivés. Ils ont torturé, massacré, sacrifié des quartiers entiers aux ténèbres ! Nous étions dans notre vaisseau, en orbite, quand nous avons commencé à recevoir tous ces messages... La moitié des gardiens à la surface se sont immédiatement joints à l'ennemi ! Ils ont même attaqué notre vaisseau en nous envoyant un fléau qui a poussé la moitié de l'équipage à s'ôter la vie ! Nous nous sommes échappés de justesse et avons réussi à grande peine à arriver jusqu'ici... Pourquoi ? Qu'avons-nous fait pour mériter ça ? »
languages.original_text: "What more proof do I need?" {n}the man shouts.{/n} "Kiava Gamma used to be a prosperous world, my family transported goods from there for generations! And then they came. They butchered, tortured, sacrificed entire blocks to the darkness! We were on our ship, up in orbit, and all those messages started coming in... Half the wardens down there joined them right away! And they even reached us in our ship with some blight that made half our crew take their own lives! We barely escaped, we barely made it here... Why? Why did this happen to us?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous voulez des preuves ? {n}tonne l'homme.{/n} Kiava Gamma était un monde prospère, ma famille a travaillé dans l'exportation de marchandises pendant des générations ! Puis ils sont arrivés. Ils ont torturé, massacré, sacrifié des quartiers entiers aux ténèbres ! Nous étions dans notre vaisseau, en orbite, quand nous avons commencé à recevoir tous ces messages... La moitié des gardiens à la surface se sont immédiatement joints à l'ennemi ! Ils ont même attaqué notre vaisseau en nous envoyant un fléau qui a poussé la moitié de l'équipage à s'ôter la vie ! Nous nous sommes échappés de justesse et avons réussi à grande peine à arriver jusqu'ici... Pourquoi ? Qu'avons-nous fait pour mériter ça ? »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Refugee

languages.text: "Was denn noch für Beweise?", {n}ruft der Mann.{/n} "Kiava Gamma war eine wohlhabende Welt, meine Familie hat seit Generationen von dort Waren importiert. Und dann kamen sie. Sie massakrierten, folterten, opferten ganze Blocks der Dunkelheit! Wir waren auf unserem Schiff, oben im Orbit, und plötzlich kamen diese Nachrichten rein ... Die Hälfte der Wächter unten hat sich ihnen sofort angeschlossen! Und sie haben sogar uns in unserem Schiff mit einer Seuche erreicht, wegen der unsere halbe Crew Selbstmord begangen hat! Wir sind nur knapp entkommen, haben es kaum hier hergeschafft ... Warum? Warum ist uns das zugestoßen?"
languages.original_text: "What more proof do I need?" {n}the man shouts.{/n} "Kiava Gamma used to be a prosperous world, my family transported goods from there for generations! And then they came. They butchered, tortured, sacrificed entire blocks to the darkness! We were on our ship, up in orbit, and all those messages started coming in... Half the wardens down there joined them right away! And they even reached us in our ship with some blight that made half our crew take their own lives! We barely escaped, we barely made it here... Why? Why did this happen to us?"

traits.locale_text: "Was denn noch für Beweise?", {n}ruft der Mann.{/n} "Kiava Gamma war eine wohlhabende Welt, meine Familie hat seit Generationen von dort Waren importiert. Und dann kamen sie. Sie massakrierten, folterten, opferten ganze Blocks der Dunkelheit! Wir waren auf unserem Schiff, oben im Orbit, und plötzlich kamen diese Nachrichten rein ... Die Hälfte der Wächter unten hat sich ihnen sofort angeschlossen! Und sie haben sogar uns in unserem Schiff mit einer Seuche erreicht, wegen der unsere halbe Crew Selbstmord begangen hat! Wir sind nur knapp entkommen, haben es kaum hier hergeschafft ... Warum? Warum ist uns das zugestoßen?"
traits.speaker: Footfall_Refugee

languages.text: "Daha ne kanıt lazım?" {n}Adam bağırıyor.{/n} "Kiava Gama eskiden refah içinde bir dünyaydı, ailem nesiller boyunca oradan mal sevkiyatı yaptı! Sonra onlar geldi. İnsanları katlettiler, işkence yaptılar, koca mahalleleri karanlığa kurban ettiler! Biz yörüngedeki gemimizdeydik, sonra mesajlar gelmeye başladı. Aşağıdaki muhafızların yarısı anında onlara katıldı! Hatta bir illetleri gemimize kadar ulaştı, mürettebatımızın yarısının kendi canına kıymasına sebep oldu! Zar zor kaçtık, güç bela buraya ulaştık... Neden? Bütün bunlar niye bizi buldu?"
languages.original_text: "What more proof do I need?" {n}the man shouts.{/n} "Kiava Gamma used to be a prosperous world, my family transported goods from there for generations! And then they came. They butchered, tortured, sacrificed entire blocks to the darkness! We were on our ship, up in orbit, and all those messages started coming in... Half the wardens down there joined them right away! And they even reached us in our ship with some blight that made half our crew take their own lives! We barely escaped, we barely made it here... Why? Why did this happen to us?"

traits.locale_text: "Daha ne kanıtına ihtiyacım olacak?" {n}diye bağırıyor adam.{/n} "Kiava Gama eskiden refah içindeki bir dünyaydı, ailem nesiller boyunca oradan ürün nakliyatı yaptı! Sonra onlar geldi. İnsanları katlettiler, onlara işkence yaptılar, komple mahalleleri karanlığa kurban ettiler! Biz yörüngedeki gemimizdeydik ve sonra mesajlar gelmeye başladı. Aşağıdaki muhafızların yarısı direkt onlara katıldı! Hatta bir hastalıkları gemimize kadar ulaştı ve mürettebatımızın yarısı o yüzden kendi canına kıydı! Biz zar zor kaçtık, buraya zar zor ulaştık. Neden? Bütün bunlar başımıza neden geldi?"
traits.speaker: Footfall_Refugee
